item.title: Sorting Algorithms
item.description: Source code We are going to have a look at several sorting algorithms, their implementation, and their performance. In particular, we will discuss about Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort, Selection Sort, Merge Sort, Quick Sort, and Heap Sort. 1- Bubble Sort Bubble Sort is a sorting algorithm that repeatedly swap the adjacent elements if they are in wrong order. It repeatedly pass through the list until the list is sorted. “File:Bubble-sort-example-300px.gif” by Swfung8 is licensed under CC BY-SA 3.
